sentence.Network_en: I would be insanely jealous if Bill left me for another woman.
sentence.Network_cn: 如果比尔为了别的女人离开我，我会妒忌得发疯的。

sentence.Network_en: Everyone is gibbering insanely, nerves frayed as showtime approaches.
sentence.Network_cn: 随着开演时间逼近，大家都紧张起来，慌里慌张地念着台词。

sentence.Network_en: He got insanely angry at being made a fool of.
sentence.Network_cn: 他为受到愚弄而气得发昏.

PerfectNetExp.abs: “疯狂”用英语怎么写？-英语-外语-天涯问答 ... magazine 杂□ ... insanely 疯狂地 insanitary 不卫生的.
「疯狂得要紧」（insanely）是乔布斯生前最爱说的口头襌。比尔•盖茨就是利用这句话，向这位老朋友兼同行致以哀悼。

list.abs: affection 疾患affective insanity 情感性精神病-
专业词汇在线翻译、医学专业在线词典、双语例句 ... 定菌形成 gnotophoresis 发疯 go insane 看病 go to a doctor.
苹果电脑的创始人史蒂夫乔布斯用“酷毙了(Insanely Great)”来形容25年前的首台可鼠标点击图形化界面的商用苹果Macintosh 128K电脑。
乔布斯对世界的评判是极端化的，产品在他看来要么“酷毙”(insanely great)，要么是狗屎(shit)；下属要么是天才，要么是笨蛋(bozos)。
[Taiwan]泼猴( monkey insane)- My Time(我们的世代)(Alumb Test)by MusicofAsia 3,202 views 2:02 White Eyes 白目乐队 live@ 2008.

entry.tran: 精神错乱的;精神失常的;疯狂的
entry.def: Someone who is insane has a mind that does not work in a normal way, with the result that their behaviour is very strange.

example.ex: Some people simply can't take it and they just go insane...
example.tran: 一些人完全承受不了，结果就精神失常了。

example.ex: Agnes was a battered woman who had killed, in self-defense, while temporarily insane.
example.tran: 阿格尼丝是个备受虐待的女人,她在一时精神错乱下出于自我防卫杀了人。

entry.def: If you describe a decision or action as insane, you think it is very foolish or excessive.

example.ex: I said, 'Listen, this is completely insane.'
example.tran: 我说：“听着,这简直荒唐之极。”

sentences.sentence: "he behaves crazily when he is off his medication"
